p: Leishmania amazonensis (MHOM/BR/76/MA-76) promastigote forms were cultured at 26°C in Schneider's Insect medium (Sigma, USA) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco-USA), 100U/mL of penicillin (Gibco, USA), and 100 μg/mL of streptomycin (Sigma, USA) [ 18]. Cultures with a maximum of seven in vitro passages were used.
